transArray.content: The room feels smaller than the picture, but very, very, very clean! There are also many intelligent facilities, such as small sofas or small tables with a little sense of design! Even the room card and the painting in the room are the same picture! It just gives people a feeling of warmth, refinement and lots of cute little touches. If I go to Haidian District next time, I will probably come here again HHHHH

Thank you very much for your affirmation and love for Xiaoji. Giving you a quiet and comfortable stay experience has always been the direction of our efforts. Every step of our growth is inseparable from your support. We look forward to your visit again.
